title-part.text: SUBSTITUTES FOR COCOA OR COCOA PRODUCTS

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the following term is used with the meaning indicated: "ice-cream" includes any edible frozen or congealed semi-liquid or pasty substance, e.g. slush ice
In this subclass, subject matter which cannot be completely classified in a single one of the main groups should be classified in each relevant main group
